definition: as the shadow follows the body (idiom)/closely associated with each other/to follow relentlessly
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: The Moon whispers in your heart like an old soul everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 那一轮清月，却似神秘的心灵低语，如影随形。

sentences.english: But for every success, there are dozens of failures.
sentences.chinese: 可惜成功总是与失败如影随形。

sentences.english: If with a pure mind a person speaks or acts, happiness follows him like his never-departing shadow.
sentences.chinese: 若人以清净之心言行，快乐将跟随着他，如影随形。

sentences.english: At on the market, mimicry with shine on to move the west the phenomenon of the building is always inseparable.
sentences.chinese: 在市场上，模仿与照搬西方建筑的现象始终如影随形。

sentences.english: As to the butterfly that broken hope, as the shadow follows the form only teach not abandon.
sentences.chinese: 如是化成雨蝶那才碎了心愿，如影随形只教不相弃。

sentences.english: They soon became inseparable and would be by each other's side all the time.
sentences.chinese: 狄斯妮和基拉很快就密不可分，总是如影随形。

sentences.english: Trouble is a friend, yeah trouble is a friend of mine. Oh oh!
sentences.chinese: 噢噢，困惑如影随形，是的，像个我内心的朋友。

sentences.english: Love are treading on thin ice, but the pain ruyingsuixing.
sentences.chinese: 缫爱情如履薄冰，痛苦却如影随形。

sentences.english: He followed her everywhere, but she did not want Apollo's love.
sentences.chinese: 他如影随形地跟着达妮芙，可她不想接受阿波罗的爱。

sentences.english: And this kind of uncomfortableness associates and follows everyone of us closely.
sentences.chinese: 而且这种不适感如影随形，与我们每个人亦步亦趋。

sentences.english: Miss is a very mysterious thing, as the shadow follows the form.
sentences.chinese: 思念是一种很玄的东西，如影随形。

sentences.english: The return to the ways of ancient Rome “has closely paralleled the decline of Christianity”.
sentences.chinese: 对古罗马样式的回归“与基督教的衰退如影随形”。

sentences.english: Unemployment is still in the stratosphere and shows no sign of improving.
sentences.chinese: 失业问题依然鬼魅般如影随形，并且没有好转的迹象。

sentences.english: Black was the shadow of yourself, tacking a little silence left.
sentences.chinese: 黑色如影随形，追逐着存留不多得沉默。

definition: lit. body and shadow follow each other (idiom)/fig. inseparable
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
to drift without a resting place (idiom)/roving/errant/vagrant/erratic
